summary: This is an automated court notification email regarding the scheduling of a removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell via video conference on July 2, 2020, before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone in the U.S. District Court for the District of New Hampshire.

keyFacts: A removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 PM via video conference.
The hearing was to be held before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone in the District of New Hampshire.
The case is identified as USA v. Maxwell, case number 1:20-mj-00132-AJ.
